description: sketch; kneeling Christ at center, wearing blindfold, with many dynamically-posed figures surrounding him; archway in background
medium: Black and white chalk on laid paper
provenance: Baron Detlev von Hadeln (1878-1935), Florence. Carl Robert Rudolf, Lugt 2811b, London (until 1977; his sale, Sotheby's, London, May 19, 1977, no. 129, as Unidentified Saint, for Â£1,000, to Moir); Alfred Moir, Santa Barbara (1977-d. 2010; bequeathed to MIA)
title: The Mocking of Christ
